result.execSummary:
The defendant Brian F. Roach was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Child Abuse-Recklessly Cause Harm, a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.03(3)(b).
  • Lewd, Lascivious Behavior-In Public, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 944.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

superMiscConds.notes: Defendant is to pay court costs.

Defendant to have no contact with the victim N.L.  Defendant to have no contact with A.H.  Defendant to have no contact with minors under the age of 18 unless approved by the Department of Corrections.

Defendant is to comply with any treatment/programming as deemed appropriate by the COMPAS assessment and agent. The defendant is to complete a sex offender evaluation and counseling as recommended by the Department of Corrections. The defendant is to compelte domestic violence programming. The defendant is to comply with the sex offender registry.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

supervisions.notes: To run concurrent to Trempealeau County case# 17CF77.

superMiscConds.notes: Defendant to have no contact with the victim N.L.  Defendant to have no contact with A.H.  Defendant to have no contact with minors under the age of 18 unless approved by the Department of Corrections.
Defendant is to comply with any treatment/programming as deemed appropriate by the COMPAS assessment and agent. The defendant is to complete domestic violence programming.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

supervisions.notes: Defendant to pay fine and costs. Defendant to pay at a rate of $50 per month commencing 6-17-17 and on the 1st of each month thereafter until paid in full. If not paid, on day in jail for each $50.00 of unpaid fines.
Defendant to pay DNA surcharge. To be paid as outlined in fines.
Defendant to submit DNA sample and defendant is to fingerprinted.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Defendant Brian F. Roach in court with attorney Michael R. Cohen.  Taavi Mc Mahon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State moves to amend charges.  Court grants motion.  State files amended information.  Def wishes to enter plea to amended counts, defense files plea questionnaire.  Court advises rights, court finds defendant KVI waives rights and accepts plea.  Diversion agreement accepted on count 1.  Complaint used as factual basis and court finds defendant guilty on count 2.  Defendant sentenced.
